title: Theresa May – 2010 Speech to Police Federation
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Theresa May, the Home Secretary, to the Police Federation on 19th May 2010.
content:
[![theresamay](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/theresamay.jpg)](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/theresamay.jpg)
